forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Clear then Slight Chance Drizzle
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after midnight. Mostly clear, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 7 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the morning unfurls with a delicate promise of a mostly sunny day, the kind where the gentle embrace of the southwest breeze carries with it the fresh scent of the bay. As the sun climbs higher, casting its golden glow across the skyline, the air remains cool yet inviting, with temperatures nudging towards a mild 64 degrees before gradually dipping as the day unfolds—a tender reminder of the city's capricious climate. 

However, as twilight approaches, whispers of a slight chance of drizzle may grace the evening, cloaking the city in a soft veil of mist, a hallmark of its coastal charm. The low will settle around a comfortable 50 degrees, nudging passersby to wrap in light layers for the night ahead. Today beckons for a stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps an outdoor coffee to savor the moment, as the light dances off the waves. But as dusk beckons, embrace a cozy corner of your favorite café, watching the ebb and flow of life as the clouds begin to roll in, softly reminding all of the ever-present marine layer just beyond.
